Career Profile

Enterprise Architect and a leader with a decade experience in Project planning, Delivery, Mentoring, Research & Development. Strengths include Rapid Learning Ability, Self Driven, Excellent communication with colleagues at all levels, Active contributor to Open source projects and communities. Have experience in the following domains: Intellectual Property, eCommerce, Language Learning and Telecommunication.
